title: build: race.bat doesn't return an error on failure
body:
race.bat doesn't seem to exit with a failure when the build fails.

I just verified that rev ac90d9ab473a says this when I watch it do its live build,

```
ok  	regexp/syntax	7.774s
ok  	runtime	62.079s
?   	runtime/cgo	[no test files]
ok  	runtime/debug	0.457s
fatal error: findfunc: bad findfunctab entry

goroutine 29 [running]:
runtime.throw(0x70dd90, 0x1f)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/panic.go:511 +0x98 fp=0xc082475a38 sp=0xc082475a20
runtime.findfunc(0x609915, 0x4573d8)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/symtab.go:162 +0xeb fp=0xc082475a58 sp=0xc082475a38
runtime.FuncForPC(0x609915, 0x788068)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/symtab.go:125 +0x2f fp=0xc082475a70 sp=0xc082475a58
runtime/pprof_test.funcÂ·005(0x1, 0xc08215e168, 0x2, 0xce7b)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/pprof/pprof_test.go:147 +0xb4 fp=0xc082475b60 sp=0xc082475a70
runtime/pprof_test.parseProfile(0xc082049200, 0xc08215e000, 0x6760, 0xcea8, 0xc082475ea0)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/pprof/pprof_test.go:117 +0x928 fp=0xc082475cc0 sp=0xc082475b60
runtime/pprof_test.testCPUProfile(0xc082049200, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc082475f58)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/pprof/pprof_test.go:157 +0x3e5 fp=0xc082475f30 sp=0xc082475cc0
runtime/pprof_test.TestMathBigDivide(0xc082049200)
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/pprof/pprof_test.go:303 +0x80 fp=0xc082475f70 sp=0xc082475f30
testing.tRunner(0xc082049200, 0x11d6138)
	C:/workdir/go/src/testing/testing.go:448 +0x142 fp=0xc082475fd0 sp=0xc082475f70
runtime.goexit()
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2446 +0x1 fp=0xc082475fd8 sp=0xc082475fd0
created by testing.RunTests
	C:/workdir/go/src/testing/testing.go:556 +0xc85

goroutine 1 [chan receive]:
testing.RunTests(0x758678, 0x11d60c0, 0xc, 0xc, 0x1)
	C:/workdir/go/src/testing/testing.go:557 +0xce1
testing.(*M).Run(0xc08200c280, 0x11fb7a0)
	C:/workdir/go/src/testing/testing.go:486 +0xe8
main.main()
	runtime/pprof/_test/_testmain.go:76 +0x294

goroutine 17 [syscall, locked to thread]:
runtime.goexit()
	C:/workdir/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2446 +0x1
FAIL	runtime/pprof	14.129s
ok  	runtime/race	15.755s
ok  	sort	1.513s
ok  	strconv	4.073s
ok  	strings	2.181s
```

... but the build coordinator sees a successful exit status from it, so it reports "ok" to the dashboard.

/cc @dvyukov @alexbrainman @minux @adg for anybody who can help with Windows batch files.
